entry.title: Pashinyan laments over corruption, despite cases against own government members

media:group.media:title: Pashinyan laments over corruption, despite cases against own government members
media:group.media:description:
Armenia has slipped three places in Transparency International‚Äôs 2022 Corruption Perceptions Index. Every year, the Berlin-based non-governmental organization releases a report ranking countries by their perceived levels of public sector corruption. In the 2022 report, Armenia slid five places, from 58th to 63rd.

entry.title: Armenia to create voluntary military service program for women

media:group.media:title: Armenia to create voluntary military service program for women
media:group.media:description:
üìçWork is underway to set up a meeting between the foreign ministers of Armenia, Azerbaijan and Russia, according to a senior official at Russia‚Äôs Foreign Ministry. üìçArmenia has delivered more than 30 tons of humanitarian aid to earthquake-affected areas of Syria. üìçArmenia‚Äôs Defense Ministry has put forward a draft law that would create a voluntary military service program for women that would run for six months.
